<title level="1" right="Rules">[Precious Material Weapons](/Rules.aspx?ID=3177)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 240 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Weapons made of precious materials are more expensive and sometimes have special effects. You can make metal weapons out of any of these materials except [duskwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2918), and wooden weapons out of duskwood. To determine the Price of 10 pieces of ammunition, use the base Price for a single weapon, without adding any extra for Bulk.

[Click here for the Precious Material Weapons category page](/Equipment.aspx?Category=37&Subcategory=38).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
